thread.title: Jerry Maler

author: Jerry Maler
title: Jerry Maler
text:
I purchased the 7-8' Giant Fuyu Persimmon tree. It arrived within a couple day of shipment via Fedex. I was expecting a whip but to my surprise the tree had a nice shape with many branches and buds and minimal tip pruning. The caliper of the stock was a good 2 inches and the grafted Fuyu was at least 1 3/4 inches. There was a large cluster of nice size roots about the size of a pencil. Overall a fantastic tree.
I will definitely shop Willis Ochard when shopping fruit trees in the future.
I highly recommend Willis Ochard to anyone shopping trees on the internet.
Canyon Lake TX
